content: This message was given concerning the Ammonites. This is what the  says:
This message was given concerning Edom. This is what the  of Heaven’s Armies says:
And this is what the  says: “If the innocent must suffer, how much more must you! You will not go unpunished! You must drink this cup of judgment!
For I have sworn by my own name,” says the , “that Bozrah will become an object of horror and a heap of ruins; it will be mocked and cursed. All its towns and villages will be desolate forever.”
This message was given concerning Damascus. This is what the  says:
A Message about Kedar and Hazor
This message was given concerning Kedar and the kingdoms of Hazor, which were attacked by King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon. This is what the  says:
This message concerning Elam came to the prophet Jeremiah from the  at the beginning of the reign of King Zedekiah of Judah.
